view.css: <style>.Control { display: flex; flex: 0 0 auto; width: 50%; padding-right: 20px; line-height: 1.5; box-sizing: border-box; } .Categories { display: flex; overflow-x: auto; width: 100%; } .Category { display: flex; } .Seperator { height: calc(100% - 20px); border-left: 1px solid #979797; margin-right: 16px; top: 20px; left: 4px; } .TrackerCategory-description { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; } .TrackerCategory-summary { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 600; font-size: 18px; line-height: 24px; } .TrackerCategory-toggle { outline: transparent; position: relative; font-size: 20px; box-sizing: border-box; min-width: 40px; height: 20px; border-radius: 10px; transition: all 0.1s ease 0s; border: 1px solid #605e5c; background: #fff; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 0 3px; overflow: visible; margin: 0 3px; } .TrackerCategory-slider { display: block; width: 12px; height: 12px; border-radius: 50%; transition: all 0.1s ease 0s; background-color: #605e5c; border-color: transparent; border-width: 6px; border-style: solid; box-sizing: border-box; } .TrackerCategory-content { width: 100%; } .TrackerCategory-header { width: auto; overflow-wrap: break-word; } .TrackerCategory-checkbox { display: none; } .TrackerCategory-label { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; overflow-wrap: break-word; } input:checked + .TrackerCategory-label > div:nth-of-type(2) { background: #0078d4; justify-content: flex-end; } input:checked + .TrackerCategory-label > div > span { background-color: #fff; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .Categories { flex-direction: column; display: flex; overflow-x: visible; } .Seperator { height: auto; border-left: 0; margin-right: 0; } .Control { flex-direction: column; width: auto; margin-right: 0; } }</style>
